Depend.Cond: (value(CS_USETOCONNECT) != Datasource) or ((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == JDBC) or ((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == EMBEDDED_SQL) or (value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == ADONET)))
(value(CS_USETOCONNECT) != Driver) or ((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == JDBC) or ((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == EMBEDDED_SQL) or ((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == ADONET) or (value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == Ruby))))
((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == JDBC) and ((value(JDBC_CUSTOM_URL) == true) and (true))) or (((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == ADONET) or (value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == Ruby)) and (true))

((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) != ODBC) or (value(CS_USETOCONNECT) == Driver)) and (((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == JDBC) and ((value(JDBC_CUSTOM_URL) == false) or (false))) or ((((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == ADONET) or (value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == Ruby)) and (false)) or ((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) != JDBC) and ((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) != ADONET) and (value(ACCESS_TECHNO) != Ruby)))))
((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == EMBEDDED_SQL) and (false)) or ((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == ODBC) and (value(CS_USETOCONNECT) != Driver))

((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == JDBC) and ((value(JDBC_CUSTOM_URL) == false) and (value(JDBC_DRIVER) != _COM.ibm.db2.jdbc.app.DB2Driver))) or ((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == ADONET) or ((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == Ruby) and (true)))
((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) != JDBC) or (value(JDBC_CUSTOM_URL) == true)) and ((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) != ADONET) and (value(ACCESS_TECHNO) != Ruby))
((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == JDBC) and (value(JDBC_CUSTOM_URL) == false)) or ((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == ADONET) and (true))
(value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == JDBC) or (((value(TRUSTED_CONNECTION) != Yes) and (value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == ADONET)) or (value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == Ruby))
(value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == JDBC) or ((value(TRUSTED_CONNECTION) != Yes) and ((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == ADONET) or (value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == Ruby)))

Prop.Name: Database name attribute
Prop.Description: Connection string attribute for Database Name (odbc driver dependant)

Prop.Name: Service name attribute
Prop.Description: Connection string attribute for Oracle Service Name (odbc driver dependant)

Prop.Name: Server name attribute
Prop.Description: Connection string attribute for Server Name (odbc driver dependant)

Prop.Name: Use datasource for web based applications
Prop.Description: Use datasource for web based applications

Prop.Name: Create all pool connections at startup
Prop.Description: Create all pool connections at startup

Depend.Cond: ((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == ADONET) and (true)) or ((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == ODBC) or ((value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == JDBC) or (value(ACCESS_TECHNO) == Ruby)))
